participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Determined and supportive, he enjoys challenges and is always looking for ways to improve himself.
participant_1.background: I try to eat healthy foods and exercise regularly because I want to get in better shape for my girlfriend and the baby. I have a daughter. I love the game halo. I am a software engineer, and I am trying to figure out how to cope with my recent breakup. I love growing plants in my greenhouse, but I have to be careful about what I grow because of my asthma.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Friendly and nurturing, she values relationships and enjoys spending quality time with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I grew up in a small town where the winters were long and cold. I love to cuddle up with my pug on rainy days. I spend a good deal of time on social media. I have a close relationship with my mother. I would love to have lunch with my girlfriend, Luis.

content.text: Hey how are you doing today
pretty good just got back from a run and im getting ready to make dinner
I am doing well, just got home from work. How was your run?
it was good i ran 7 miles today which is the farthest ive run in a while
wow that is impressive! I just started running again and i can only run 3 miles without stopping
Keep at it! youll get better in no time
Thanks! I hope so. I really want to get back into shape.
You will! Just keep at it and dont give up
I wont! Thanks for the encouragement
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play video games, cook, and go out to eat
Same here! I love to play Halo and cook. I also love to go out to eat with friends and family
What's your favorite food?
I love Italian food! What's yours?
I love Mexican food!
That's great! I love Mexican food too!
We should have lunch together sometime
That would be great! Id love to have lunch with you
Awesome! I'll text you my number
Sounds good
